fields.name: Advertisement
fields.template:
Hi {{USERNAME}},
 
Congratulations!
Your advertisment has been posted successfully.
 
Thanks for contacting.
We will get back to you soon.
 
Warm Regards,
{{WEBSITE}} Team
fields.subject: {{WEBSITE}} | Your advertisment has been posted successfully

fields.name: Buy Success(as a gift)
fields.template:
Hi {{FRIEND_{{NAME}}}},
 
Congratulations!
Your friend {{BUYER_{{NAME}}}} has gifted the {{BUSINESS}} deal voucher.
 
Your Voucher Details:
Voucher Key: {{VOUCHER_NO}}
Redeem On or before: {{VALID_DATE}}
Duration: {{REMAINING_DAYS}}
 
Redeem your voucher at the below listed outlets.
{{BUSINESS}} Outlets
 
Warm Regards,
{{WEBSITE}} Team
fields.subject: {{WEBSITE}} | Your friend has gifted a deal voucher

fields.name: Buy Success(Confirmation)
fields.template:
Hi {{USERNAME}},
 
Congratulations!
You've bought the {{BUSINESS}} deal voucher successfully!
 
Your Voucher Details:
Voucher Key: {{VOUCHER_NO}}
Redeem On or before: {{VALID_DATE}}
Validity: {{REMAINING_DAYS}}
 
{{BUSINESS}} Outlets
 
Warm Regards,
{{WEBSITE}} Team
fields.subject: {{WEBSITE}} | ThankYou for buying the deal voucher

fields.name: Contact Us

fields.subject: {{WEBSITE}} | Thank you for contacting us

fields.name: Expired Classified
fields.template:
Hi {{USER{{NAME}}}},
 
Your {{CLASSIFIED_TYPE}} classified ad listing has been expired.
You can renew it by clicking on the below link.
 
{{RENEW_URL}}
 
You can also post new classified ads by clicking on the below link.
{{ADD_URL}}
 
Warm Regards,
{{WEBSITE}} Team
fields.subject: {{WEBSITE}} | Your classified ad submission has been expired

fields.name: Feedback
fields.template:
Hi {{USERNAME}},
 
Thank you for your feedback
 
We will look forward to your suggestions
 
Warm Regards,
{{WEBSITE}} Team
fields.subject: {{WEBSITE}} | Your feedback has been posted successfully

fields.name: Forget Password
fields.template:
Hi {{USERNAME}},
 
Your login credentials as requested for your {{WEBSITE}} account are as follows:

To Sign In:
{{RETRIEVE_URL}}
Click the sign in link and then type your username and password in the sign in box.
 
Warm Regards,
{{WEBSITE}} Team
fields.subject: {{WEBSITE}} | Your login credentials

fields.name: Publish Article
fields.template:
Hi {{USERNAME}} ,
Congratulations!
Your {{ARTICLE_TYPE}} " {{ARTICLE_TITLE}} " has been published and you can view by clicking on the below link.
{{ARTICLE_URL}}
 
If you would like to submit more articles.Please click on the below link
{{ADD_URL}}
 
Warm Regards,
{{WEBSITE}} Team
fields.subject: {{WEBSITE}} | Your article has been published successfully!

fields.name: User Invitation
fields.template:
Hi,
Your friend {{USERNAME}} has invited you to join {{WEBSITE}}
 
Hey! I've registered with {{WEBSITE}} and thought you might like to join too.
Here's an invitation to create an account.
 
To accept this invitation and register at {{WEBSITE}}
Join {{SITE_URL}} Now
 
Warm Regards,
{{WEBSITE}} Team
fields.subject: {{WEBSITE}} | You've Been Invited!!

fields.name: User SignUp
fields.template:
Hi {{USER{{NAME}}}},
 
Thank You for signing up with {{WEBSITE}}.Please save this message for future reference.
Your login credentials for your {{WEBSITE}} account are:
 
Username: {{USER{{NAME}}}}
Password: {{PASSWORD}}
 
To Sign In
{{LOGIN_URL}}
Click the sign in link and then type your username and password in the sign in box.
 
Warm Regards,
{{WEBSITE}} Team
fields.subject: Welcome to {{WEBSITE}} | Thank You for signing up
